snippet.title: Befuddle: The Bewitching Puzzle Party Game - Story Trailer
snippet.description: Befuddle is a cozy multiplayer party game where players take turns decoding the addictive word puzzles of your favourite songs, books, films and video games! Deliberate, deduce and decipher the mixed up titles with your friends or Twitch viewers and see who’s the best Befuddler! Wishlist Now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1756140/Befuddle_The_Bewitching_Puzzle_Party_Game/
